patent_validity: Syntex's patents properly claim the medicine itself or its use
relevant_rule: Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations define 'claim for the medicine itself' and 'medicine'
application_of_law: Only claims for the medicine itself or its use are protected
dispute_focus: whether Syntex's patents qualify for protection under the Regulations
procedure_followed: Judicial review of patent claims and interpretation of regulatory language
court_ruling: Court rules in favor of Syntex, prohibiting NOC issuance until patent expiration
